import React, { Component } from 'react' import { LargeHeading, SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings' import { Switch } from '@/components/Switch' import { ColoredButtons } from '@/components/button/index' import './index.scss' class FcAndDnd extends Component { state = { totalPush: false, generalPush: false, smartTrigger: false, geoTrigger: false, refreshFC: false, throttlePush: false, dnd: false, } render() { const { totalPush, generalPush, smartTrigger, geoTrigger, refreshFC, throttlePush, dnd, } = this.state console.log(this.state, 'state of fc') return (
Common Setting
Frequency Capping <> this.setState({ refreshFC: !refreshFC })} label="Refresh the frequency capping daily at 00:00 GMT" /> <> this.setState({ totalPush: !totalPush })} label="Total push notificaitons send uptp" /> {totalPush && (
this.setState({ generalPush: !generalPush })} /> this.setState({ smartTrigger: !smartTrigger })} /> this.setState({ geoTrigger: !geoTrigger })} />
)}
General Push Setting
Push Notification Throttling this.setState({ throttlePush: !geoTrigger })} />
Smart Trigger Campaigns
Do Not Disturb this.setState({ geoTrigger: !geoTrigger })} />
Save
) } } export default FcAndDnd
